pullRequest.body:
Having the ordered ring hierarchy results available here results in extra effort for typeclass searches.

---

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/35b7e556-b02c-4eb7-bf00-186f2a4e9293) for commit 87e33292f0c2d2873cf053cc64b0dbc6a0f5674f.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/502684f1-325e-4935-8672-7dc4d1ed67fc/to/35b7e556-b02c-4eb7-bf00-186f2a4e9293) against commit 7e4afad324f0ef8bd76e01d86296e8663ae8ac1f:
```diff
  Benchmark                                 Metric         Change
  ===============================================================
+ ~Mathlib.GroupTheory.MonoidLocalization   instructions   -14.9%
```

* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#14122~~
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#14121~~
